StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: To be a part of dynamic and progressive organization that offers challenging working environment where one can utilize energy and competences in a positive direction and contribute towards overall objectives of organization.

PositionHistory.Title: Project Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Provide technical solutions related to production database for issues related to Federal Express(US) Transportation management system and International shipping system. Involved in Oracle DB patches and code fixes in Oracle environment. Hands on experience in Linux system and AS400 system to provide technical support to FedEx US shipping applications. Opened, tracked and resolved incident response and service requests, ensuring problem ownership, promoting end user satisfaction Provided technical expertise, system knowledge, and applicable code updates to support production & testing database as it relates to customer issues and concerns Resolved customer complaints and concerns with strong verbal and negotiation skills. Displayed courtesy and strong interpersonal skills with all customer interactions. Maintained composure and patience in face of difficult customer.
Project: FedEx US

PositionHistory.Description:
applications desc:
Transportation Management System is a web-based application that allows the station users to create or schedule the trips from One Hub to the Other Hub. Also, it is interfaced with many systems for Payment, Settlement for Drivers, Vehicle Maintenance etc. Based on the role assigned, the user will be able to perform his operations. Administrator creates user profile, Account setup system, and Authorization controls. The program administrator can create, edit and delete the corporate cards.

SecurityCredential.Name:
Duration: ~ June, 2018 onwards
Description: International Clearance deals with the shipments/Packages that need to cross the USA/CA Border. It helps in creating a Manifest that contains the details of Driver, Tractor, Trailer and the Packages which is then submitted to the customs for their approval. Once the Customs provide the approval, the Driver starts the trip and reaches the border to submit the approval manifest. Customs verifies the manifest and approve the trip to cross the border.

Transportation Management System is a web-based application that allows the station users to create or schedule the trips from One Hub to the Other Hub. International Clearance
Duration: ~ June, 2018 onwards
Description: International Clearance deals with the shipments/Packages that need to cross the USA/CA Border. It helps in creating a Manifest that contains the details of Driver, Tractor, Trailer and the Packages which is then submitted to the customs for their approval. Once the Customs provide the approval, the Driver starts the trip and reaches the border to submit the approval manifest. Customs verifies the manifest and approve the trip to cross the border.
Projects:
Minor Project A project on the topic "Movie Success Prediction using data mining"(a website with front end using HTML, CSS, PHP, JAVASCRIPT and back end using Data Mining techniques like Decesion tree and K-means clustering
Major project A project on "Health Management System" which measured Temperature, Pressure and Heart rate of patient and then classify them as fit or not fit and if they are prone to a heart disease or not. An android app was also made through which user can log into their profile or the can use the website as well. Skills involved: Data mining, Sql, Android and Web designing Certifications In Wipro Limited.
TRAINED SKILLS: Sep-2018 PEGA L1 Jul-2018 SAP Security L1 Jul-2018 SAP GRC -Governance-Risk-ComplianceL1 Jul-2018 SAP BASIS L1Jul-2018 SAP ABAP L1 Jul-2018 RDBMS - Database Development L1 Jul-2018 Oracle SQL L1 Jun-2018
Education UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computers) from SRM university (SRMU) in 2018
